actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_sumtotal as (
	SELECT (case EXTRACT(month FROM date_trunc('month',view_date)) when '1' THEN 'Jan'
				when '2' THEN 'Feb'
				when '3' THEN 'Mar'
				when '4' THEN 'Apr'
				when '5' THEN 'May'
				when '6' THEN 'June'
				when '7' THEN 'July'
				when '8' THEN 'Aug'
				when '9' THEN 'Sept'
				when '10' THEN 'Oct'
				when '11' THEN 'Nov'
				when '12' THEN 'Dec'
				END) as Month,
	count(DISTINCT(title)) as count_site,
	video_id,title,name,created_time,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as Total_Video_Views,
	cast(total_video_view_total_time as decimal) as Total_Watch_Hrs,
	cast(total_video_impressions as decimal)/1000 as Revenue
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
	WHERE view_date = '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date
			AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
and created_time >= '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}'
  AND created_time < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}'
	and name is not null
group by date_trunc('month',view_date),video_id,title,name,created_time,Total_Video_Views,Total_Watch_Hrs,Revenue),
CTE_view_date as (
	SELECT (case EXTRACT(month FROM date_trunc('month',view_date)) when '1' THEN 'Jan'
				when '2' THEN 'Feb'
				when '3' THEN 'Mar'
				when '4' THEN 'Apr'
				when '5' THEN 'May'
				when '6' THEN 'June'
				when '7' THEN 'July'
				when '8' THEN 'Aug'
				when '9' THEN 'Sept'
				when '10' THEN 'Oct'
				when '11' THEN 'Nov'
				when '12' THEN 'Dec'
				END) as Month,
	count(DISTINCT(title)) as count_site,
	video_id,title,name,created_time,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as Total_Video_Views,
	cast(total_video_view_total_time as decimal) as Total_Watch_Hrs,
	cast(total_video_impressions as decimal)/1000 as Revenue
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
	WHERE view_date = '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
			AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
and created_time >= '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}'
  AND created_time < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}'
group by date_trunc('month',view_date),video_id,title,name,created_time,Total_Video_Views,Total_Watch_Hrs,Revenue)
SELECT * FROM(
	select coalesce(CTE_sumtotal.name,CTE_view_date.name) as channel,
CTE_sumtotal.month as Months,
sum(CTE_view_date.count_site) as cnt,
SUM(CTE_sumtotal.Total_Video_Views-CTE_view_date.Total_Video_Views) as Views,
SUM(CTE_sumtotal.Total_Watch_Hrs-CTE_view_date.Total_Watch_Hrs) as Watch_Hrs,
SUM(CTE_sumtotal.Revenue-CTE_view_date.Revenue) as Revenue
from CTE_sumtotal FULL join CTE_view_date on CTE_sumtotal.video_id=CTE_view_date.video_id
	where coalesce(CTE_sumtotal.name,CTE_view_date.name) is not null and
	CTE_sumtotal.month is not null
group by channel,Months
order by channel)
AS T
UNION ALL
select 'Total','Month',sum(CTE_view_date.count_site),SUM(CTE_sumtotal.Total_Video_Views-CTE_view_date.Total_Video_Views),
SUM(CTE_sumtotal.Total_Watch_Hrs-CTE_view_date.Total_Watch_Hrs),
SUM(CTE_sumtotal.Revenue-CTE_view_date.Revenue)
from CTE_sumtotal FULL join CTE_view_date on CTE_sumtotal.video_id=CTE_view_date.video_id;
